name: penance (JammingWithThePanas)
description:
A girl sets out on a tortuous path in search of forgiveness. Abseil down a creepy path full of disgusting monsters.

Controls: WASD and spacebar.

The panas:

  • ZAM (@TheZampapan)
  • Alberto Egea  (@AlbertoEgeaDV)
  •  Fran Vadillo (@FranVadilloSB)
  • Guillermo Pitarque (@Latrabili_Noctu)
